column1: The Funeral Liturgy will be celebrated Thursday
column3: 2015 at 10:00 a.m. at St. Catherine of Siena Parish ï¿½ St. Vincent de Paul Church. Rev. Fr. John Sarge and Sr. Virginia Scally
column4: SNDdeN will officiate over the funeral rites with Private Committal in Calvary Cemetery. Friends may call at the Gephart Funeral Home
column5: Inc. Wednesday from 2:00 to 8:00 p.m. The Vigil for the Deceased will take place Wednesday evening at 7:00 p.m. Mrs. Deshaw will be taken to the church on Thursday to lie in state from 9:00 a.m. and until the time of the Mass at 10:00 a.m.
